publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1359 Tricia Marwick: Neurological Alliance of Scotland-That the Parliament welcomes the launch on 26 May 2004 of the Neurological Alliance of Scotland; notes that an estimated one million people in Scotland live with a neurological condition, a tenth of whom are disabled by that condition; while encouraged by the recent increase in the number of neurologists, deplores the long waiting times to see a specialist and the continuing geographical inconsistencies across Scotland in the provision of neurological services, and supports the alliance's call for a strategic approach to developing services to meet identified neurological needs throughout Scotland.
S2M-1359 Neurological Alliance of Scotland (lodged on 25 May 2004) Michael Matheson*
